rulesStrings.li: initialPhaseLetterText->The sky is dimming and a dense fog is starting to creep in. Soon it will be hard to see anything not lit by fire.
mainPhaseLetterText->A darkening terror is descending. Reports of screams outside the colony have come in.
darknessLiftedLetterText->The darkening terror has begun to dissipate. The alps have started to retreat!
